PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PackingInstructions
PropertySetDef.Definition: Packing instructions are specific instructions relating to the packing that is required for an artifact in the event of a move (or transport).

PropertyDef.Name: ContainerMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Special requirements for material used to contain an artefact.

PropertyDef.Name: PackingCareType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of care that may be required when handling the artefact during a move where:\X\0D \X\0D Fragile: artefact may be broken during a move through careless handling.\X\0D HandleWithCare: artefact may be damaged during a move through careless handling.

PropertyDef.Name: WrappingMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Special requirements for material used to wrap an artefact.
